name: glitChessOut
description:
glitChessOut is an endless chess game where you have to run from the slowly decaying world to not get infested by the glitches.

The chess pieces are controlled with the left mouse button.

If an enemy chess piece is captured, the piece that captured the enemy levels up.

If you have leveled a piece to a king you can spawn in a new pawn anywhere on the board with the right mouse button.
This will downgrade the currently selected king back to a pawn.

You can switch between pieces by pressing tab.

There are special checker tiles that have special effects:

    

-Can not be traversed

    

-Take an extra turn

   
-Wait a turn
